attributes.action: Stop the further expansion of Blakes Golf Course in North Weald, Essex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The grounds will be developed from waste excavations from Stratford.  The transfering of 000's of tonnes of material as filler for the proposed site will result in 150 lorry journeys daily over a period of 3 years.  This will destroy the local habitat and environment and product so many tonnes of carbon gases to polute the atmosphere.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
